framed.design package¶

Submodules¶

framed.design.combinatorial module¶

This module implements methods for combinatorial deletions.

@author: Daniel Machado

framed.design.combinatorial.combinatorial_deletion(model, fobj, max_dels, kind='reactions', targets=None, method='FBA', reference=None, min_growth=0.01, abstol=0.001)¶

Generic interface for computing for a set of combinatorial gene or reaction deletions.

Parameters:
  • model – CBModel – model
  • fobj – function – optimization objective function
  • max_dels – maximum number of deletions
  • kind – str – genes or reactions (default)
  • method – str – simulation method: FBA (default) or MOMA
  • targets – list (of str) – deletion targets (default: all)
  • min_growth – float – minimum fraction of growth rate to consider a deletion non-letal (default: 0.01)
  • abstol – float – minimum objective function value (default: 1e-4)
Returns:

list (of (list of str, float)) – valid solutions
framed.design.combinatorial.combinatorial_gene_deletion(model, objective, max_dels, targets=None, method='FBA', reference=None, min_growth=0.01, abstol=0.001)¶

Compute solutions for a set of combinatorial gene deletions.

Parameters:
  • model – CBModel – model
  • fobj – function – optimization objective function
  • max_dels – maximum number of deletions
  • method – str – simulation method: FBA (default) or MOMA
  • targets – list (of str) – deletion targets (default: all)
  • min_growth – float – minimum fraction of growth rate to consider a deletion non-letal (default: 0.01)
  • abstol – float – minimum objective function value (default: 1e-4)
Returns:

list (of (list of str, float)) – valid solutions
framed.design.combinatorial.combinatorial_reaction_deletion(model, objective, max_dels, targets=None, method='FBA', reference=None, min_growth=0.01, abstol=0.001)¶

Compute solutions for a set of combinatorial reaction deletions.

Parameters:
  • model – CBModel – model
  • fobj – function – optimization objective function
  • max_dels – maximum number of deletions
  • method – str – simulation method: FBA (default) or MOMA
  • targets – list (of str) – deletion targets (default: all)
  • min_growth – float – minimum fraction of growth rate to consider a deletion non-letal (default: 0.01)
  • abstol – float – minimum objective function value (default: 1e-4)
Returns:

list (of (list of str, float)) – valid solutions

framed.design.greedy module¶

This module implements a greedy approach for combinatorial deletions.

@author: Daniel Machado

framed.design.greedy.greedy_deletion(model, fobj, max_dels, kind='reactions', targets=None, method='FBA', reference=None, min_growth=0.1, pop_size=10, abstol=0.001)¶

Generic interface for finding an optimal set of gene or reaction deletions using a greedy approach.

Parameters:
  • model – CBModel – model
  • objective – dict (of str to float) – optimization objective (reaction ids and coefficients)
  • max_dels – maximum number of deletions
  • kind – str – genes or reactions (default)
  • method – str – simulation method: FBA (default) or MOMA
  • targets – list (of str) – deletion targets (default: all)
  • min_growth – float – minimum percentage of growth rate to consider a deletion non-letal (default: 0.01)
  • abstol – float – minimum objective function value (default: 1e-4)
Returns:

list (of (list of str, float)) – valid solutions

Module contents¶

Package implementing rational strain design methods.

@author: Daniel Machado
